subject: Steroids
lead_paragraph: The Brazilian star Romario was acquitted of doping when a sports tribunal overturned his verdict, allowing him to return to competition. The Superior Tribunal of Sports Justice accepted Romario’s contention that he did not take a performance-enhancing drug for Vasco da Gama’s game against Palmeiras on Oct. 28, a team spokesman said.
